Name: Phil
Attack_note: 每次攻擊固定給予敵人 ATK 80 的攻擊
Attack_note_eng: Each attack deals ATK 60 damage constantly.

Name: York
Attack_note: 每次給予敵人 ATK 40 - 90 之間的攻擊, 30% 機率給予 ATK 120 的爆擊
Attack_note_eng: Each attack deals ATK 40 - 90 damage, with a 30% possibility of dealing ATK 120 critical hit.

Name: Thomas
Attack_note: 每次給予敵人 ATK 60 - 120 之間的攻擊, 20% 機率給予 ATK 150 的爆擊
Attack_note_eng: Each attack deals ATK 60 - 120 damage, with a 20% possibility of dealing ATK 150 critical hit.

Name: Harper
Attack_note: 每次給予敵人 ATK 80 - 140 之間的攻擊, 10% 機率給予 ATK 180 的爆擊
Attack_note_eng: Each attack deals ATK 80 - 140 damage, with a 10% possibility of dealing ATK 180 critical hit.
